title: Linux Reaches 5% Desktop Market Share in USA
author: marcodiego
aiHeadline: Linux finally reaches 5% desktop market share in the USA, proving that niche is the new mainstream, but don't hold your breath for world domination.

title: Ukrainian hackers destroyed the IT infrastructure of Russian drone manufacturer
author: doener
aiHeadline: Ukrainian hackers take down Russian drone manufacturer's IT infrastructure, showing that in the digital age, the best defense is a good offense, and a bad server.

title: Cloudflare 1.1.1.1 Incident on July 14, 2025
author: nomaxx117
aiHeadline: Cloudflare's 1.1.1.1 service goes down, reminding us that even the best DNS providers can have a bad hair day, leaving the internet in a tizzy.

title: Shipping WebGPU on Windows in Firefox 141
author: Bogdanp
aiHeadline: Firefox 141 brings WebGPU to Windows, finally giving Windows users a reason to celebrate, unless they're still waiting for that feature they asked for five years ago.

title: I'm switching to Python and actually liking it
author: cesarsotovalero
aiHeadline: A developer switches to Python and actually likes it, proving that sometimes, the grass is indeed greener on the other side, especially when it's not filled with curly braces and semicolons.
